armored pants.description: They're not easy to get off. No matter, the tale of your smell is well beyond any of your accomplishmets

armored vest.description: Basically a large piece of metel welded around your body. Not very comfortable to sleep in.

baseball bat.description: classic home evasion deterrent, you've given this thing about 87 nicknames by now

baton.description: this might have been the same one you got beat with during your college protestor phase

beard.description: sometimes the only protection your head needs, is the confidence that you have a badass beard

bowie knife.description: won at an auction. I thought. it's previous owner was 1980's glam rock king. sir david.

briefcase.description: it's filled with IOU's, here's one for a ferrari,

broadsword.description: This thing has a big ol' blade. Looks friggin' boss.

broom.description: but it's not really a broom, it's a horse

cardboard box shoes.description: You accidently stumbled into them and haven't yet bothered to take them off.

crowbar.description: arguably the most powerful weapon humanity has ever wielded

gloves.description: you know what they say about big gloves? it's winter

guitar.description: Fender Stratocaster with triple single coil pickups and a whammy bar. Pre-CBS Fender corporate buy-out. I'd raise the bridge and take the buzz out of the low E.

high heels.description: I asked for stillettos and they gave me these shoes

katana.description: bought from an ocean side novelty shop. it has randy jackson's signature on it

kaunch.description: you have been granted permission to speak

lead pipe.name: lead pipe
lead pipe.desc: oh geez, i hope i never half to use this

leather boots.description: durable and light, these boots go really well with your legend of zelda cosplay

mace.description: not the spray, but equally as painfull to the eyes

pigskin.description: From the depths of the garage. You've never used it and you hope you never have to...

rubber chicken.description: a birthday present once. It wasn't funny then but it's hilarious now.

sliced bread.description: well... this is the greatest thing ever

spellbook.description: it's all written in a language you've never seen before, but somehow... you understand everything...

smelly.name: smelly
smelly.desc: The item smells like.... mold? eggs? sulphur? You can't quite place it, as it burns your nose too much to try

blessed.name: blessed
blessed.desc: The gods smile upon this item

broken.name: broken
broken.desc: It's in terrible shape, it hardly even works anymore, but so much blood and sweat has been stained into it that you need to see how far it can actually go.

electric.name: electric
electric.desc: equipping the item makes your hair stand on end

evil.name: electric
evil.desc: there are dark forced that live in this object. it puts bad thoughts in your head.

healing.name: healing
healing.desc: a steady flow of life eminates from this weapon. makes it kind of hard to attack with.

hot.name: hot
hot.desc: this item always feels like it came out of liquid hot magma. After a while you get used to holding it, as your last few subdermal receptors explode

lucky.name: lucky
lucky.desc: things just seem to always go your way when you have this equipped

prickly.name: prickly
prickly.desc: hurts when equipped. Who made this?

slippery.name: slippery
slippery.desc: item is hard to hold, for some reason you can't quite get a hold of it.

toxic.name: toxic
toxic.desc: should probably wash your self after touching it
